name: Shirt Large Red Gray Striped
description:
This is a men's button-down shirt in size men's 34-35 large by Arrow.
 The shirt is dark blue with red and white pinstriping. The shirt is collared, features a full front button closure and a breast pocket.
 The shirt measures approximately 27.5 from the back of the neck to the hem, 25.25 from underarm to underarm, and 24 from the top of the shoulder to the cuff when laid flat. It was made in Bangladesh from a 55/45 cotton/polyester blend.
 It comes in very good pre-owned condition.
